trans-unit.source: Set up protection between on-premises VMware Sites
trans-unit.target: Set up protection between on-premises VMware Sites

trans-unit.source: Use this article to configure protection between two VMware sites using Azure Site Recovery.
trans-unit.target: Use this article to configure protection between two VMware sites using Azure Site Recovery.

trans-unit.source: Set up protection between on-premises VMware sites
trans-unit.target: Set up protection between on-premises VMware sites

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: InMage Scout in Azure Site Recovery provides real-time replication between on-premises VMware sites.
trans-unit.target: InMage Scout in Azure Site Recovery provides real-time replication between on-premises VMware sites.

trans-unit.source: InMage Scout is included in Azure Site Recovery service subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: InMage Scout is included in Azure Site Recovery service subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: **Azure account**—You'll need a [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.microsoft.com/) account.
trans-unit.target: **Azure account**—You'll need a [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.microsoft.com/) account.

trans-unit.source: You can start with a [free trial](pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: You can start with a [free trial](pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Create a vault
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Create a vault

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Management Portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Management Portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click **Data Services** > **Recovery Services** > **Site Recovery Vault**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Data Services** > **Recovery Services** > **Site Recovery Vault**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create New** > **Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create New** > **Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: In **Name** enter a friendly name to identify the vault.
trans-unit.target: In **Name** enter a friendly name to identify the vault.

trans-unit.source: In **Region** select the geographic region for the vault.
trans-unit.target: In **Region** select the geographic region for the vault.

trans-unit.source: To check supported regions see Geographic Availability in [Azure Site Recovery Pricing Details](pricing/details/site-recovery/).
trans-unit.target: To check supported regions see Geographic Availability in [Azure Site Recovery Pricing Details](pricing/details/site-recovery/).

trans-unit.source: Check the status bar to confirm that the vault was successfully created.
trans-unit.target: Check the status bar to confirm that the vault was successfully created.

trans-unit.source: The vault will be listed as **Active** on the main Recovery Services page.
trans-unit.target: The vault will be listed as **Active** on the main Recovery Services page.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Configure the vault and download InMage Scout components
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Configure the vault and download InMage Scout components

trans-unit.source: Click **Create vault**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create vault**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Recovery Services** page, click the vault to open the Quick Start page.
trans-unit.target: In the **Recovery Services** page, click the vault to open the Quick Start page.

trans-unit.source: In the dropdown list, select **Between two on-premises VMware sites**.
trans-unit.target: In the dropdown list, select **Between two on-premises VMware sites**.

trans-unit.source: Download InMage Scout.
trans-unit.target: Download InMage Scout.

trans-unit.source: The setup files for all of the required components are in the downloaded zip file.
trans-unit.target: The setup files for all of the required components are in the downloaded zip file.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Install component updates
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Install component updates

trans-unit.source: Read about the latest [updates](#updates).
trans-unit.target: Read about the latest [updates](#updates).

trans-unit.source: You'll install the update files in the following order:
trans-unit.target: You'll install the update files in the following order:

trans-unit.source: RX server if there is one
trans-unit.target: RX server if there is one

trans-unit.source: Configuration servers
trans-unit.target: Configuration servers

trans-unit.source: Process servers
trans-unit.target: Process servers

trans-unit.source: Master target servers.
trans-unit.target: Master target servers.

trans-unit.source: vContinuum servers.
trans-unit.target: vContinuum servers.

trans-unit.source: Install as follows:
trans-unit.target: Install as follows:

trans-unit.source: Download the [update](http://download.microsoft.com/download/9/F/D/9FDC6001-1DD0-4C10-BDDD-8A9EBFC57FDF/ASR Scout 8.0.1 Update1.zip) zip file.
trans-unit.target: Download the [update](http://download.microsoft.com/download/9/F/D/9FDC6001-1DD0-4C10-BDDD-8A9EBFC57FDF/ASR Scout 8.0.1 Update1.zip) zip file.

trans-unit.source: This zip file contains the following files:
trans-unit.target: This zip file contains the following files:

trans-unit.source: RX_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3279231_23Jun15.tar.gz
trans-unit.target: RX_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3279231_23Jun15.tar.gz

trans-unit.source: CX_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259146_23Jun15.exe
trans-unit.target: CX_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259146_23Jun15.exe

trans-unit.source: UA_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.exe
trans-unit.target: UA_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.exe

trans-unit.source: UA_RHEL6-64_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.tar.gz
trans-unit.target: UA_RHEL6-64_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.tar.gz

trans-unit.source: vCon_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259523_23Jun15.exe
trans-unit.target: vCon_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259523_23Jun15.exe

trans-unit.source: Extract the zip files.
trans-unit.target: Extract the zip files.

trans-unit.source: **RX server**: Copy **RX_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3279231_23Jun15.tar.gz** to the RX server and extract it.
trans-unit.target: **RX server**: Copy **RX_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3279231_23Jun15.tar.gz** to the RX server and extract it.

trans-unit.source: In the extracted folder run **/Install**.
trans-unit.target: In the extracted folder run **/Install**.

trans-unit.source: **Configuration server/process server**: Copy **CX_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259146_23Jun15.exe** to the configuration server and process server.
trans-unit.target: **Configuration server/process server**: Copy **CX_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259146_23Jun15.exe** to the configuration server and process server.

trans-unit.source: Double click to run it.
trans-unit.target: Double click to run it.

trans-unit.source: **Windows master target server**: To update the unified agent copy **UA_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.exe** to the master target server.
trans-unit.target: **Windows master target server**: To update the unified agent copy **UA_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.exe** to the master target server.

trans-unit.source: Double click it to run it.
trans-unit.target: Double click it to run it.

trans-unit.source: Note that the unified agent for Windows isn't applicable on the source server.
trans-unit.target: Note that the unified agent for Windows isn't applicable on the source server.

trans-unit.source: It should be installed on the Windows master target server only.
trans-unit.target: It should be installed on the Windows master target server only.

trans-unit.source: **Linux master target server**: To update the unified agent copy **UA_RHEL6-64_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.tar.gz** to the master target server and extract it.
trans-unit.target: **Linux master target server**: To update the unified agent copy **UA_RHEL6-64_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259401_23Jun15.tar.gz** to the master target server and extract it.

trans-unit.source: In the extracted folder run **/Install**.
trans-unit.target: In the extracted folder run **/Install**.

trans-unit.source: **vContinuum server**: Copy **vCon_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259523_23Jun15.exe** to the vContinuum server.
trans-unit.target: **vContinuum server**: Copy **vCon_Windows_8.0.1.0_GA_Update_1_3259523_23Jun15.exe** to the vContinuum server.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you've closed the vContinuum Wizard.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you've closed the vContinuum Wizard.

trans-unit.source: Double click on the file to run it.
trans-unit.target: Double click on the file to run it.

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Set up replication
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Set up replication

trans-unit.source: Set up replication between the source and target VMware sites.
trans-unit.target: Set up replication between the source and target VMware sites.

trans-unit.source: For guidance, use the InMage Scout documentation that's downloaded with the product.
trans-unit.target: For guidance, use the InMage Scout documentation that's downloaded with the product.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can access the documentation as follows:
trans-unit.target: Alternatively you can access the documentation as follows:

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: Compatibility matrix
trans-unit.target: Compatibility matrix

trans-unit.source: User guide
trans-unit.target: User guide

trans-unit.source: RX user guide
trans-unit.target: RX user guide

trans-unit.source: Quick installation guide
trans-unit.target: Quick installation guide

trans-unit.source: Updates
trans-unit.target: Updates

trans-unit.source: ASR Scout 8.0.1 Update 1
trans-unit.target: ASR Scout 8.0.1 Update 1

trans-unit.source: This latest update includes bug fixes and new features:
trans-unit.target: This latest update includes bug fixes and new features:

trans-unit.source: 31 days of free protection per server instances.
trans-unit.target: 31 days of free protection per server instances.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to test functionality or set up a proof-of-concept.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to test functionality or set up a proof-of-concept.

trans-unit.source: All operations on the server, including failover and failback are free for the first 31 days starting from the time that a server is first protected using ASR Scout.
trans-unit.target: All operations on the server, including failover and failback are free for the first 31 days starting from the time that a server is first protected using ASR Scout.

trans-unit.source: From the 32nd day onwards, each protected server will be charged at the standard instance rate for Azure Site Recovery protection to a customer owned site.
trans-unit.target: From the 32nd day onwards, each protected server will be charged at the standard instance rate for Azure Site Recovery protection to a customer owned site.

trans-unit.source: At any time, the number of protected servers that are currently being charged is available on the Dashboard page of the Azure Site Recovery vault.
trans-unit.target: At any time, the number of protected servers that are currently being charged is available on the Dashboard page of the Azure Site Recovery vault.

trans-unit.source: Support added for vCLI 5.5 Update 2.
trans-unit.target: Support added for vCLI 5.5 Update 2.

trans-unit.source: Support added for Linux operating systems on the source server:
trans-unit.target: Support added for Linux operating systems on the source server:

trans-unit.source: RHEL 6 Update 6
trans-unit.target: RHEL 6 Update 6

trans-unit.source: RHEL 5 Update 11
trans-unit.target: RHEL 5 Update 11

trans-unit.source: CentOS 6 Update 6
trans-unit.target: CentOS 6 Update 6

trans-unit.source: CentOS 5 Update 11
trans-unit.target: CentOS 5 Update 11

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes to address the following issues:
trans-unit.target: Bug fixes to address the following issues:

trans-unit.source: Vault registration fails for the configuration server or RX server.
trans-unit.target: Vault registration fails for the configuration server or RX server.

trans-unit.source: Cluster volumes don't appear as expected when clustered virtual machines are reprotected during resume.
trans-unit.target: Cluster volumes don't appear as expected when clustered virtual machines are reprotected during resume.

trans-unit.source: Failback fails when master target server is hosted on a different ESXi server from the on-premises production virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Failback fails when master target server is hosted on a different ESXi server from the on-premises production virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: Configuration file permissions are changed when upgrading to 8.0.1, affecting protection and operations.
trans-unit.target: Configuration file permissions are changed when upgrading to 8.0.1, affecting protection and operations.

trans-unit.source: Resynchronization threshold isn't enforced as expected, leading to inconsistent replication behavior.
trans-unit.target: Resynchronization threshold isn't enforced as expected, leading to inconsistent replication behavior.

trans-unit.source: RPO settings not appearing correctly in the configuration server interface.
trans-unit.target: RPO settings not appearing correctly in the configuration server interface.

trans-unit.source: Uncompressed data value incorrectly shows compressed value.
trans-unit.target: Uncompressed data value incorrectly shows compressed value.

trans-unit.source: The Remove operation doesn't delete as expected in the vContinuum wizard and replication isn't deleted from the configuration server interface.
trans-unit.target: The Remove operation doesn't delete as expected in the vContinuum wizard and replication isn't deleted from the configuration server interface.

trans-unit.source: In the vContinuum wizard the disk is automatically unselected when clicking on **Details** in the disk view during protection of MSCS virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: In the vContinuum wizard the disk is automatically unselected when clicking on **Details** in the disk view during protection of MSCS virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: During P2V scenario required HP sevices such as CIMnotify, CqMgHost aren't moved to Manual in the recover virtual machine, resulting is additional boot time.
trans-unit.target: During P2V scenario required HP sevices such as CIMnotify, CqMgHost aren't moved to Manual in the recover virtual machine, resulting is additional boot time.

trans-unit.source: Linux virtual machine protected fails when there are more than 26 disks on the master target server.
trans-unit.target: Linux virtual machine protected fails when there are more than 26 disks on the master target server.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Post any questions on the [Azure Recovery Services Forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/azure/home?forum=hypervrecovmgr).<
trans-unit.target: Post any questions on the [Azure Recovery Services Forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/azure/home?forum=hypervrecovmgr).<
